text:
thanks a lot that really help good :heart: <@U04EJHVD8FM>. but do you maybe also know how to fix know that the data on the left side is out of the view? :sweat_smile:

on the left side before "PRIORITY" is another column called "ELEMENTE" which i cannot see :see_no_evil:. But I can only scroll to all columns on the right side after "Aufwandsschätzung"
But nevertheless many many thanks to you :heart:
okay fixed it by putting the Table into a <Flex> 1000 times thank you again :smile: have a nice day!!

Hi I added secrets to the account but when I try to use it, it always be `undefined` .
• Already added secrets using `hs secrets add`
• Defined secret name in `serverless.json` also
• Retrieved secrets via context `context.secrets.TEST_API_KEY`
Did I miss any steps?

Hello channel :wave::skin-tone-2: - has anyone else found themselves in need of a rich text extension component?
I see you can add bold or italic with the current component but I'm really trying to render the rich text/HTML from a rich text field on an object. Has anyone figured out a way to do this successfully on a custom tab?
<@U05DR67KZ28> Where did you find usage of `context.secrets` ? If you found it in one of our docs, or code samples, please point me to the place. We probably missed an update. Thanks.

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> actually we have 1 project using this before, so I just followed and in the doc there are two ways of accessing them that confused me a little

<https://app.HubSpot.com/docs/24197740/doc/platform/serverless-functions>
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> Maybe these first couple of hits here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/hs-search-results?term=context.secrets>
